scenes.description: A full moon hangs over an empty highway, with a solitary radio tent glowing under floodlights.
Ela listens to radio static, noting down coordinates.

dialogues.line: Got it. Stay calm. I’ll send help.

scenes.description: A damaged spacecraft lies in the sand. Marcus is struggling inside.

dialogues.line: Life support at twenty-three percent. Engine integrity critical. Radio beacon offline.

scenes.description: Sheriff Miller navigates to the crash site.
Sheriff Miller arrives and helps Marcus. Ela joins them.

dialogues.line: Stay still. Medics are en route.
We’ll get you out of here.

scenes.description: Ela reflects on the night’s events with Sheriff Miller.

dialogues.line: He made it through the night.

parsed_data.formatted_text:
SCRIPT TIMELINE
Total Duration: 0:18:00
Total Scenes: 6


================================================================================

SCENE 1
EXT. DESERTED HIGHWAY - NIGHT
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 2

Description:
A full moon hangs over an empty highway, with a solitary radio tent glowing under floodlights.

Main Characters: ELA

Technical Cues:
  - ANGLE ON tent’s entrance
  - SOUND: Radio static

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - radio tent
    - floodlights
  LIGHTING:
    - moonlight
    - floodlights
  SOUND:
    - radio static
  CAMERA:
    - ANGLE ON
    - establishing shots


Transitions: CUT TO

================================================================================

SCENE 2
INT. RADIO TENT - CONTINUOUS
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 3

Description:
Ela listens to radio static, noting down coordinates.

Main Characters: ELA, MARCUS (V.O.)

Technical Cues:
  - SOUND: Radio static
  - low light from lantern

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - radio equipment
    - lantern
  LIGHTING:
    - dim lighting to create shadows
  SOUND:
    - radio static
  CAMERA:
    - close-ups of Ela


Dialogue:
ELA (into mic)
    "Command, do you copy? Over."

MARCUS (V.O.) (faint, urgent)
    "…help…engine failure…coordinates… Desolation Road…"

ELA (softly)
    "Got it. Stay calm. I’ll send help."


Transitions: CUT TO

================================================================================

SCENE 3
EXT. CRASH SITE - FLASHBACK
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 3

Description:
A damaged spacecraft lies in the sand. Marcus is struggling inside.

Main Characters: MARCUS

Technical Cues:
  - SFX: Sparks
  - EXTREME CLOSE-UP

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - spacecraft
  LIGHTING:
    - sparks for dramatic effect
  SOUND:
    - SFX: Sparks
  CAMERA:
    - EXTREME CLOSE-UP


Dialogue:
MARCUS (groans)
    "Computer, status report."

AI VOICE (O.S.)
    "Life support at twenty-three percent. Engine integrity critical. Radio beacon offline."

MARCUS (breathless)
    "Then manually reboot comms. Now."


Transitions: CUT BACK TO

================================================================================

SCENE 4
EXT. DESOLATION ROAD - LATE NIGHT
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 3

Description:
Sheriff Miller navigates to the crash site.

Main Characters: SHERIFF MILLER

Technical Cues:
  - moving vehicle shots

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - SUV
    - map
  LIGHTING:
    - headlights
  SOUND:
    - engine sounds
  CAMERA:
    - shots from inside the SUV


Dialogue:
SHERIFF MILLER (muttering to himself)
    "36.114, –115.172… gotta be close."


Transitions: DISSOLVE TO

================================================================================

SCENE 5
EXT. CRASH SITE - MOMENTS LATER
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 4

Description:
Sheriff Miller arrives and helps Marcus. Ela joins them.

Main Characters: SHERIFF MILLER, MARCUS, ELA

Technical Cues:
  - spotlight effect

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - first-aid kit
  LIGHTING:
    - spotlight
  SOUND:
    - breathing
  CAMERA:
    - close-ups of characters


Dialogue:
MARCUS (weak, coughing)
    "You… you made it."

SHERIFF MILLER
    "Stay still. Medics are en route."

MARCUS
    "Thank you… Ela."

ELA
    "We’ll get you out of here."


Transitions: CUT TO

================================================================================

SCENE 6
INT. RADIO TENT - DAWN
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 3

Description:
Ela reflects on the night’s events with Sheriff Miller.

Main Characters: ELA, SHERIFF MILLER

Technical Cues:
  - soft lighting from sunrise

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - photo of Marcus
  LIGHTING:
    - soft sunrise lighting
  SOUND:
    - soft radio bleep
  CAMERA:
    - medium shots of characters


Dialogue:
SHERIFF MILLER
    "He made it through the night."

ELA
    "Thanks to you all."


Transitions: FADE OUT

warnings.message: Time transition from 'NIGHT' in Scene 1 to 'CONTINUOUS' in Scene 2 should be explicitly defined in non-linear flashback settings.
'MOMENTS LATER' following a 'FLASHBACK' in Scene 3 may create confusion without clear timeline context.
